description:
For Hachiman’s plan to succeed, they’ll need allies from other schools. Communicating with those allies, however, is easier said than done…
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Saigo made, Yuigahama Yui wa Mimamori Tsuzukeru.
Until the End, Yui Yuigahama Will Continue Watching Over Them.
Yui Yuigahama veille jusqu`à la fin
حتى النهاية، ستظل يويغاهاما يوي تعتني بهما.
最後まで, 由比ヶ浜結衣は見守り続ける.
